member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerAction`1
member.summary: Base class for custom trigger action runtime behavior. Extend this class to create the "Action" portion of a custom trigger, which implements the runtime execution logic when the trigger is activated.
member.typeparam: The CustomTriggerActionInfo type that contains configuration for this action.
member.remarks: Override Start() for initialization and Update() for per-frame logic. Set this.state to TriggerActionState.Done when execution is complete. Access configuration via the strongly-typed 'info' field.

member.name: F:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerAction`1.info
member.summary: Strongly-typed reference to the configuration data for this trigger action.

member.name: P:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerAction`1.Info
member.summary: Gets or sets the trigger action configuration.

member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerActionInfo
member.summary: Base class for custom trigger action configuration data. Extend this class to create the "Info" portion of a custom trigger, which stores configuration and provides the level editor GUI.
member.remarks: This class is serialized to level files. All public fields will be saved and loaded. Override ShowGUI to provide configuration options in the level editor.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerActionInfo.ShowGridPointOption(LevelEditorGUI,GridPoint,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a button in the level editor GUI that allows setting a GridPoint by clicking on the map.
member.param: The GridPoint to set. This will be modified when the user clicks on the map.
The label text for the button (e.g., "Set Spawn Point").
member.remarks: Call this from your ShowGUI override to allow users to select grid coordinates visually. The button shows the current column and row, and clicking it allows the user to click on the map to set a new position.

member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerManager
member.summary: Manages registration and lifecycle of custom triggers for the Broforce level editor.
member.remarks: This class handles trigger registration, serialization, and integration with the level editor. Modders should only need to call RegisterCustomTrigger to add new trigger types.

member.name: F:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerManager.CustomTriggers
member.summary: List of all registered custom triggers, sorted by tag, priority (descending), and action name.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerManager.RegisterCustomTrigger(System.Type,System.Type,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Registers a new custom trigger type with the level editor. Call this during mod initialization, before any levels are loaded.
member.param: The Type of your CustomTriggerAction class (e.g., typeof(MyTriggerAction)). Must inherit from CustomTriggerAction or LevelStartTriggerAction.
The Type of your CustomTriggerActionInfo class (e.g., typeof(MyTriggerActionInfo)). Must inherit from CustomTriggerActionInfo or LevelStartTriggerActionInfo.
Display name for the trigger in the level editor (e.g., "My Mod - Spawn Item"). Must be unique across all registered triggers.
Category tag for grouping triggers in the menu (e.g., "Custom Bros", "My Mod"). Triggers with the same tag are grouped together.
Sort priority within the same tag. Higher values appear first. Default is 0. Use higher priority for frequently-used triggers.
member.exception: Thrown if a trigger with the same actionName is already registered.

member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager
member.summary: Manages persistent state across trigger executions and level lifecycle. Provides a simple key-value store that survives across trigger activations and level restarts.

remarks.para: This manager uses a staging pattern to ensure proper initialization order during level start:

item.description: SetForLevelStart: Stages values to be applied later in the current level start sequence (after all triggers execute)
SetDuringLevel: Applies values immediately to the current level session

remarks.para: Use SetForLevelStart in level-start triggers (when isLevelStart=true) and SetDuringLevel when the trigger is activated mid-level (when isLevelStart=false).

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.Get``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Retrieves a value from the current level state.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to retrieve.
member.param: The unique key for this value.
The value to return if the key is not found. Default is default(T).
member.returns: The stored value if found, otherwise the default value.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.SetForLevelStart``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Stages a value to be applied later in the current level start initialization sequence. Use this in level-start triggers (when isLevelStart=true in ExecuteAction).
member.typeparam: The type of the value to store.
member.param: The unique key for this value.

remarks.para: The value is staged and will be applied to current state after all level-start triggers have executed. This ensures your trigger's state is available to systems that initialize after trigger execution.
On level restarts, level-start triggers run again, re-staging their values, which ensures state persists across restarts as long as the trigger continues to execute.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.SetDuringLevel``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Sets a value immediately in the current level session. Use this when triggers are activated mid-level (when isLevelStart=false in ExecuteAction).
member.typeparam: The type of the value to store.
member.param: The unique key for this value.
member.remarks: The value is applied immediately and will be available via Get() in the current level session. This value will be lost when the level restarts unless also set via SetForLevelStart.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.RegisterLevelStartAction(System.Action)
member.summary: Registers a callback to execute when the level starts (including restarts).
member.param: The action to execute at level start.
member.remarks: Callbacks are executed after staged state is applied to current state. Exceptions in callbacks are caught and logged to prevent breaking level initialization.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.RegisterLevelEndAction(System.Action)
member.summary: Registers a callback to execute when the level ends.
member.param: The action to execute at level end.
member.remarks: Callbacks are executed before state is cleared and staged state is applied. Useful for cleanup or saving information before the level restarts. Exceptions in callbacks are caught and logged.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.CustomTriggerStateManager.OnLevelStart
member.summary: Internal method called by RocketLib when a level starts. Handles the state lifecycle: end callbacks → clear current → apply staging → start callbacks.

member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerActionInfo
member.summary: Extended base class for custom trigger configuration that can run at level start. Provides a "Run at level start" toggle in the level editor.
member.remarks: Use this as your Info base class when creating triggers that should optionally execute at level start instead of when triggered by connections. Pair with LevelStartTriggerAction for the runtime behavior.

member.name: F:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerActionInfo.RunAtLevelStart
member.summary: When true, this trigger executes at level start. When false, executes when activated by trigger connections.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerActionInfo.ShowGUI(LevelEditorGUI)
member.summary: Shows the "Run at level start" toggle in the level editor. Override this and call base.ShowGUI(gui) to add additional configuration options.

member.name: T:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerAction`1
member.summary: Simplified base class for custom triggers that can run at level start or when triggered. Automatically handles state management and provides a single ExecuteAction method.
member.typeparam: The LevelStartTriggerActionInfo type that contains configuration for this action.
member.remarks: This class simplifies trigger implementation by: - Automatically setting state to Done after execution - Providing a single ExecuteAction method instead of Start/Update - Handling level start vs trigger activation logic Use this when your trigger performs a one-time action and doesn't need per-frame updates.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerAction`1.ExecuteAction(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Implement this method to define your trigger's behavior. Called once when the trigger executes, either at level start or when triggered by connections.
member.param: True if executing at level start (info.RunAtLevelStart was true). False if executing due to trigger activation. Use this to decide whether to use CustomTriggerStateManager.SetForLevelStart or SetDuringLevel.

member.name: P:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerAction`1.Info
member.summary: Gets or sets the trigger action configuration. When set, executes the action immediately if RunAtLevelStart is true.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerAction`1.Start
member.summary: Called when the trigger is activated by connections (not at level start). Automatically sets state to Done after execution.

member.name: M:RocketLib.CustomTriggers.LevelStartTriggerAction`1.Update
member.summary: Not used by LevelStartTriggerAction. All logic is in ExecuteAction.

member.name: T:RocketLib.Settings.SettingsRecovery
member.summary: Provides recovery functionality for corrupted or incompatible XML settings files. When UnityModManager fails to deserialize a settings file due to XML errors or schema changes, this class attempts to recover as much data as possible from the invalid XML.

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.SettingsRecovery.TryRecoverSettings``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Attempts to recover settings from a potentially corrupted XML file.
member.typeparam: The settings class type, must inherit from UnityModManager.ModSettings
member.param: Path to the XML settings file to recover from
Optional default settings object to use as base, or null to create new
member.returns: A settings object with recovered values where possible, defaults for unrecoverable fields
member.remarks: Recovery process: - Simple types (bool, int, float, string, enum) are recovered individually - Arrays and Lists are recovered element by element, skipping invalid items - Complex objects are recovered if their XML structure is valid - Fields with XML attribute mappings ([XmlArray], [XmlElement]) are properly handled - Invalid or missing fields are left at their default values

member.name: T:RocketLib.Settings.XmlModSettings
member.summary: Base class for XML-based mod settings with automatic recovery from corrupted or incompatible files. Inherits from UnityModManager.ModSettings and adds automatic recovery when deserialization fails.
member.remarks: Settings are saved to the mod's ConfigPath directory (persists across Thunderstore updates). When SettingsVersion is 0 after loading, it indicates deserialization failed and recovery is attempted using .

member.name: P:RocketLib.Settings.XmlModSettings.SettingsVersion
member.summary: Version number for tracking settings schema changes. A value of 0 after loading indicates deserialization failed.

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.XmlModSettings.Load``1(UnityModManagerNet.UnityModManager.ModEntry)
member.summary: Loads settings from the mod's ConfigPath, automatically recovering data if deserialization fails.
member.typeparam: The settings class type, must inherit from XmlModSettings
member.param: The mod entry to load settings for
member.returns: The loaded settings, or recovered/default settings if loading failed

member.name: T:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings
member.summary: Base class for JSON-based mod settings with built-in migration support for schema changes. Provides automatic versioning, migration, and backup on failure.
member.remarks: Settings are saved to the mod's ConfigPath directory (persists across Thunderstore updates). When loading settings with an older version, MigrateJson is called to transform the data, and the migrated settings are automatically saved. If migration fails, the original file is backed up and default settings are returned.

member.name: P:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.SettingsVersion
member.summary: Version number stored in the settings file. Used to detect when migration is needed.

member.name: P:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.CurrentVersion
member.summary: The current schema version expected by the code. Override to increment when making breaking changes. When file version is less than this, MigrateJson is called.

member.name: P:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.FileName
member.summary: The filename for the settings file. Override to use a custom name.

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.GetPath(UnityModManagerNet.UnityModManager.ModEntry)
member.summary: Gets the full path to the settings file.
member.returns: Full path to the settings file in the mod's ConfigPath

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.Save(UnityModManagerNet.UnityModManager.ModEntry)
member.summary: Saves the current settings to disk.
member.param: The mod entry to save settings for

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.MigrateJson(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject,System.Int32)
member.summary: Override to handle migration from older settings versions. Modify the JObject directly to transform old data to the new schema.
member.param: The parsed JSON object to migrate
The version number found in the file
member.remarks: Migration uses a direct-jump pattern: migrate from any old version to current in one pass. Use cascading if-statements (not else-if) to apply all necessary migrations.

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.Save``1(``0,UnityModManagerNet.UnityModManager.ModEntry)
member.summary: Saves settings data to the mod's ConfigPath.
member.param: The mod entry to save settings for

member.name: M:RocketLib.Settings.JsonModSettings.Load``1(UnityModManagerNet.UnityModManager.ModEntry)
member.summary: Loads settings from the mod's ConfigPath, automatically migrating if the file version is older.
member.typeparam: The settings class type, must inherit from JsonModSettings
member.param: The mod entry to load settings for
member.returns: The loaded settings, migrated settings, or default settings if loading failed
member.remarks: If the file version is less than CurrentVersion, MigrateJson is called and the migrated settings are automatically saved. If migration throws an exception, the original file is backed up to {filename}.bak and default settings are returned.

member.name: T:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling
member.summary: Provides window width detection and UI scaling utilities for UnityModManager GUIs. Handles the two-pass ImGui rendering correctly to avoid control count mismatch errors.

member.name: P:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.Enabled
member.summary: Enable/disable scaling globally. Set this once per frame based on your mod's settings. Defaults to true.

member.name: M:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.TryCaptureWidth
member.summary: Captures the window width on the first frame. Call this at the start of your OnGUI method. Returns true when ready to render UI, false when still detecting width.
member.returns: True if width has been captured and UI can be rendered

member.name: P:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.WindowWidth
member.summary: Gets the detected window width, or -1 if not yet captured.

member.name: P:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.ScaleFactor
member.summary: Gets the scale factor based on baseline width (1200px). Returns 1.0 if width hasn't been captured yet.

member.name: M:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.ScaledWidth(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a scaled width GUILayoutOption. Uses the Enabled property to determine whether to apply scaling.
member.returns: GUILayoutOption for use with GUILayout methods

member.name: M:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.ScaledSpace(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates scaled horizontal space. Uses the Enabled property to determine whether to apply scaling.

member.name: M:RocketLib.UMM.WindowScaling.Reset
member.summary: Resets the cached window width, forcing re-detection on next frame. Useful for testing or if the window is resized.
